mapper.insert: insert into plan (plan_title, plan_memo, plan_reg_date, plan_end_date, username, plan_category, plan_password, plan_private) values (#{planTitle}, #{planMemo}, now(), #{planEndDate}, #{username}, #{planCategory}, #{planPassword}, #{planPrivate})
mapper.select: select p.* from plan p left join do d on p.plan_id = d.plan_id where do_id is null and plan_private = 'Y'
